text: Eliud, also known as Elihud, was a legendary king of the Britons, as recounted by Geoffrey of Monmouth. He was preceded by Urianus and succeeded by Cledaucus. He is otherwise unattested. ==References== *Geoffrey of Monmouth By Evans, Sebastian Category:Legendary British kings Category:2nd-century BC legendary rulers Category:Characters in works by Geoffrey of Monmouth
title: Eliud
